results.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Take Our Daughters and Sons To Work Day.
results.short_title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Take Our Daughters and Sons To Work Day.
results.committees: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions Committee
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: Recognizes the goals of introducing our daughters and sons to the workplace. Commends participants of Take Our Daughters And Sons To Work Day.
results.summary_short: Recognizes the goals of introducing our daughters and sons to the workplace. Commends participants of Take Our Daughters And Sons To Work Day.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2630)
Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. (text of measure as introduced: CR S2458-2459)
